'''Shigeyori Kujou''' was a historical figure who lived hundreds of years ago. He is known for building the battlefront fortress at the [[Kujou Encampment]] in one night and valiantly fighting against the forces of darkness.<ref>{{Ref/VP|Front Line, Kannazuka}}</ref>
